events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to initiate a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
Customer support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund case for this order.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
I have attached a clear photo of the wrong product that was delivered to me instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the photo. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
That sounds good. I appreciate your quick response and help with this refund process.
The refund request has been completed and processed on our end. You will receive a confirmation email shortly.
Just following up to confirm that the refund was received and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I got the refund on my card today. Thank you very much for your helpful support!
The case has been officially closed after the successful refund and customer confirmation.
